entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
